com.laurenshup.superapi

Class MessageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.laurenshup.superapi.MessageManager

  • public class MessageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is your SuperAPI's MessageManager. The actionbar works only with Minecraft 1.11.
    Author:
    Laurenshup

        public void sendTitle(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
             java.lang.String title,
             java.lang.String subtitle,
             int fadein,
             int stay,
             int fadeout)
        Sends a title to the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to send the title to
        title - the title to send to the player
        subtitle - the subtitle to send to the player
        fadein - the time in ticks to let the title fade in
        stay - the time in ticks to let the title stay
        fadeout - the time in ticks to let the title fade out
